TextBlock.Text: ANALYTICNOMAI: That should be the last of the circuitry in place. Is the warp core prepared?
CURIOUSNOMAI: Yes it is, my hard-working companion.
ANALYTICNOMAI: Okay then, go ahead and slot it into place and we will see if this somehow works.
ANALYTICNOMAI: Wait, how did that work? It should be completely impossible for that to function!
CURIOUSNOMAI: Yes! I told you it was worth attempting!
SPOOKEDNOMAI: That means we can escape! I can not wait to reunite with the rest of our clan, I had started to worry that we would never see them again.
NOMAILEADER: Let us not delay then, there is no telling how long that core will be able to hold the singularity open. Everyone, go through!
